Name: Legion of the Damned
Description: A group of former Marian soldiers who were condemned to death after their maniple refused to follow orders and killed their officer, the ex-legionnaires rebelled and razed their military barracks before escaping on captured civilian DropShips. Their knowledge of Marian operations has allowed them to perform successful raids to arm themselves, while also threatning more distant worlds.

MissionSuccessStatements: That went well. Real well. Seems like we did the right thing in calling you in, mercenary. Glad to see we both came out ahead today.
